model_answer: The video transitions from a meditative scene with a blue, multi-armed figure to an educational chart of lunar phases likely to visually reinforce the narration about the waxing and waning phases of the moon, which is explained in the audio. Option B presents evidence by mentioning the observation of 51 events of Aldebaran occultation between 2015 and 2018. This indicates that Rohini (Aldebaran) has noteworthy occultation behavior.
